Title: Puso Ni Comi
Description: ["An anime adaptation of Sega's Phantasy Star Online 2 game's official web manga ", Puso Ni Comi: Phantasy Star Online 2 Comic, '. The story follows the lax, less than weighty daily life of the ARKS force members. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
